title: Water Hardness Checker
description: Check your water hardness, find out how often to descale your specific Arco machine, and get a filter recommendation. Hard water is the number one cause of espresso machine failure — stay ahead of limescale buildup.

inputs.label: German Hardness (°dH) — use if TDS is unknown

formula: Convert TDS to °dH if needed (1 °dH ≈ 17.8 ppm). Categories: 0-7 °dH soft, 7-14 °dH medium, 14-21 °dH hard, >21 °dH very hard. Descaling frequency based on hardness × usage × machine boiler volume. Single boiler machines (Nano, Steam) descale less frequently at low usage; dual boiler and heat exchange machines (Dual Boiler, Maestro) need more frequent attention. Filter recommendation depends on hardness category and machine type.
output_format: Hardness category (soft/medium/hard/very hard), descaling frequency in weeks, recommended filter product, risk level (low/moderate/high/critical) with explanation.
